pullRequest.title: OfferBook: Show min-max range for amount and volume
pullRequest.bodyText:
The OfferBook tables now show the amount and the volume as min-max range, where appropriate.
For the offers that have no range defined, the single values are shown.
Fixes #3129

commit.message:
OfferBook: Show min-max range for amount and volume

The OfferBook tables now show the amount and the volume as min-max range, where appropriate.

For the offers that have no range defined, the single values are shown.

Fixes #3129

nodes.bodyText: Is this comment really needed? Maybe naming renderCellContent() is enough as it is private method in very specific context.
